mapper.sql: ID, COMPANY_NAME, RETURN_DATE, WAVE,DESIGN_IMG, FABRIC_MATERIAL, PARAMETER1, PARAMETER2, PARAMETER3, PARAMETER4, PARAMETER5, PARAMETER6, PARAMETER7, PARAMETER8, PARAMETER9, PARAMETER10, PARAMETER11, PARAMETER12, PARAMETER13, PARAMETER14, PARAMETER15, PARAMETER16, PARAMETER17, PARAMETER18, PARAMETER19, PARAMETER20, KG_M,TOTAL_COUNT, STATE, REMARKS, PC_IP, OPERATION, OPERATOR, ADD_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, DEL_TIME,FULFIL_STATUS
mapper.select: select * from factory_return_fabric where STATE ='1' AND ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT COUNT(0) FROM factory_return_fabric where STATE = '1' AND 1=1
AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (COMPANY_NAME='' OR COMPANY_NAME IS NULL)
AND COMPANY_NAME !=''
AND RETURN_DATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{returnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (RETURN_DATE='' OR RETURN_DATE IS NULL )
AND RETURN_DATE !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (WAVE=''OR WAVE IS NULL )
AND WAVE !=''
AND FABRIC_MATERIAL LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{fabricMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (FABRIC_MATERIAL='' OR FABRIC_MATERIAL IS NULL)
AND FABRIC_MATERIAL !=''
AND REMARKS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (REMARKS=''OR REMARKS IS NULL )
AND REMARKS !=''

select
from factory_return_fabric where STATE = '1' AND 1=1
AND COMPANY_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (COMPANY_NAME='' OR COMPANY_NAME IS NULL)
AND COMPANY_NAME !=''
AND RETURN_DATE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{returnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (RETURN_DATE='' OR RETURN_DATE IS NULL )
AND RETURN_DATE !=''
AND WAVE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{wave,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (WAVE=''OR WAVE IS NULL )
AND WAVE !=''
AND FABRIC_MATERIAL LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{fabricMaterial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (FABRIC_MATERIAL='' OR FABRIC_MATERIAL IS NULL)
AND FABRIC_MATERIAL !=''
AND REMARKS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}), '%')
AND (REMARKS=''OR REMARKS IS NULL )
AND REMARKS !=''
ORDER BY ADD_TIME DESC LIMIT #{pageNow},#{pageSize}
